tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplierInformation (
    SupplierID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    SupplierName VARCHAR(255),
    ContactPerson VARCHAR(255),
    ContactNumber VARCHAR(15),
    Address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Supplier (
    supplier_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name TEXT,
    contact_person TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    supplier_id UUID REFERENCES Supplier(supplier_id),
    production_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Inspection (
    inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    inspector TEXT,
    passed BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name VARCHAR(255), contact_person VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), certification_status BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255), supplier_id INT, expiration_date DATE, production_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id))

CREATE TABLE inspections (inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY, inspection_date DATE, inspector_name VARCHAR(255), supplier_id INT, result BOOLEAN, FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id))
CREATE TABLE violations (violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, inspection_id INT, violation_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES inspections(inspection_id))

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_date DATE,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    comments TEXT
);
